submission_type.description: Type of submission as shown on the receipt

judicial_centre.description: Judicial centre as shown on the receipt (e.g., Calgary)

category.description: Filing category as printed on the receipt

documents.description: Documents included in this filing submission

key_dates.description: Any of next court date, filing deadline, limitation date associated with the filing

fees.description: Submission-level fee totals as shown on the receipt

tariff_or_filing_fee.description: Total tariff or filing fee for the submission

printing_fee.description: Total printing/copy fee for the submission

total.description: Grand total for the submission as printed on the receipt

payment.description: Payment identifiers from the online filing system

order_number.description: Order number printed on the confirmation

filed_at.description: Timestamp printed on the receipt PDF, if captured

notes.description: Optional freeform notes about this receipt or any anomalies

document_type.description: Type or title of the document (e.g., Statement of Claim, Application, Affidavit)

file_name.description: File name as uploaded or saved by the system

pages.description: Number of pages attributed to this document, if available

tariff_fee.description: Tariff/court fee attributable to this document, if any

printing_fee.description: Printing/copy fee attributable to this document

total_fee.description: Sum of tariff_fee and printing_fee for this document
